pkgmetadata.longdescription: Blitz++ is a meta-template library for array manipulation in C++ with a speed comparable to Fortran implementations, while preserving an object-oriented interface. These results are being obtained not through better optimizing compilers, preprocessors, or language extensions, but through the use of template techniques. By using templates cleverly, optimizations such as loop fusion, unrolling, tiling, and algorithm specialization can be performed automatically at compile time.
